verses.verse: Then <S%G3767><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> six <S%G1803><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> the passover <S%G3957><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> to Bethany, <S%G963><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> Lazarus <S%G2976><s%> was, which <S%G3588><s%> had been dead, <S%G2348><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> he raised <S%G1453><s%> from the dead. <S%G3498><s%>

There <S%G1563><s%> they made <S%G4160><s%> him a supper; <S%G1173><s%> and Martha <S%G3136><s%> served: <S%G1247><s%> but Lazarus <S%G2976><s%> was one <S%G1520><s%> of them that sat <S%G4873><s%> at <S%G4873><s%> the table with him.

Then <S%G3767><s%> took <S%G2983><s%> Mary <S%G3137><s%> a pound <S%G3046><s%> of ointment <S%G3464><s%> of spikenard, <S%G3487><s%> <S%G4010><s%> very <S%G4186><s%> costly, <S%G4186><s%> and anointed <S%G218><s%> the feet <S%G4228><s%> of Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> and wiped <S%G1591><s%> his feet <S%G4228><s%> with her hair: <S%G2359><s%> and the house <S%G3614><s%> was filled <S%G4137><s%> with the odor <S%G3744><s%> of the ointment. <S%G3464><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of his disciples, <S%G3101><s%> Judas <S%G2455><s%> Iscariot, <S%G2469><s%> Simon's <S%G4613><s%> son, which <S%G3588><s%> should <S%G3195><s%> betray <S%G3860><s%> him,

Why <S%G1302><s%> was not this <S%G5124><s%> ointment <S%G3464><s%> sold <S%G4097><s%> for three <S%G5145><s%> hundred <S%G5145><s%> pence, <S%G1220><s%> and given <S%G1325><s%> to the poor? <S%G4434><s%>

This <S%G5124><s%> he said, <S%G2036><s%> not that he cared <S%G3199><s%> for the poor; <S%G4434><s%> but because <S%G3754><s%> he was a thief, <S%G2812><s%> and had <S%G2192><s%> the bag, <S%G1101><s%> and bore <S%G941><s%> what <S%G3588><s%> was put <S%G906><s%> therein.

Then <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Let <S%G863><s%> her alone: <S%G863><s%> against <S%G1519><s%> the day <S%G2250><s%> of my burying <S%G1780><s%> has she kept <S%G5083><s%> this. <S%G846><s%>
For the poor <S%G4434><s%> always <S%G3842><s%> you have <S%G2192><s%> with you; but me you have <S%G2192><s%> not always. <S%G3842><s%>

Much <S%G4183><s%> people <S%G3793><s%> of the Jews <S%G2453><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> knew <S%G1097><s%> that he was there: <S%G1563><s%> and they came <S%G2064><s%> not for Jesus' <S%G2424><s%> sake only, <S%G3440><s%> but that they might see <S%G1492><s%> Lazarus <S%G2976><s%> also, <S%G2532><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> he had raised <S%G1453><s%> from the dead. <S%G3498><s%>
But the chief <S%G749><s%> priests <S%G749><s%> consulted <S%G1011><s%> that they might put <S%G615><s%> Lazarus <S%G2976><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> to death; <S%G615><s%>

Because <S%G3754><s%> that by reason <S%G1223><s%> of him many <S%G4183><s%> of the Jews <S%G2453><s%> went <S%G5217><s%> away, <S%G5217><s%> and believed <S%G4100><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

On the next <S%G1887><s%> day <S%G1887><s%> much <S%G4183><s%> people <S%G3793><s%> that were come <S%G2064><s%> to the feast, <S%G1859><s%> when they heard <S%G191><s%> that Jesus <S%G2424><s%> was coming <S%G2064><s%> to Jerusalem, <S%G2414><s%>

Took <S%G2983><s%> branches <S%G902><s%> of palm <S%G5404><s%> trees, and went <S%G1831><s%> forth <S%G1831><s%> to meet <S%G5222><s%> him, and cried, <S%G2905><s%> Hosanna: <S%G5614><s%> Blessed <S%G2127><s%> is the King <S%G935><s%> of Israel <S%G2474><s%> that comes <S%G2064><s%> in the name <S%G3686><s%> of the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>
And Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> when he had found <S%G2147><s%> a young <S%G3678><s%> ass, <S%G3678><s%> sat <S%G2523><s%> thereon; <S%G1909><s%> <S%G846><s%> as it is written, <S%G1125><s%>

Fear <S%G5399><s%> not, daughter <S%G2364><s%> of Sion: <S%G4622><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> your King <S%G935><s%> comes, <S%G2064><s%> sitting <S%G2521><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> an ass's <S%G3688><s%> colt. <S%G4454><s%>

These <S%G5023><s%> things understood <S%G1097><s%> not his disciples <S%G3101><s%> at <S%G4412><s%> the first: <S%G4412><s%> but when <S%G3753><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> was glorified, <S%G1392><s%> then <S%G5119><s%> remembered <S%G3415><s%> they that these <S%G5023><s%> things were written <S%G1125><s%> of him, and that they had done <S%G4160><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things to him.

The people <S%G3793><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> that was with him when <S%G3753><s%> he called <S%G5455><s%> Lazarus <S%G2976><s%> out of his grave, <S%G3419><s%> and raised <S%G1453><s%> him from the dead, <S%G3498><s%> bore <S%G3140><s%> record. <S%G3140><s%>

For this <S%G5124><s%> cause <S%G1223><s%> the people <S%G3793><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> met <S%G5221><s%> him, for that they heard <S%G191><s%> that he had done <S%G4160><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> miracle. <S%G4592><s%>

The Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> among <S%G4314><s%> themselves, <S%G1438><s%> Perceive <S%G2334><s%> you how <S%G3754><s%> you prevail <S%G5623><s%> nothing? <S%G3762><s%> behold, <S%G2396><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%> is gone <S%G565><s%> after <S%G3694><s%> him.
And there were certain <S%G5100><s%> Greeks <S%G1672><s%> among <S%G1537><s%> them that came <S%G305><s%> up to worship <S%G4352><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> the feast: <S%G1859><s%>

The same <S%G3778><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> to Philip, <S%G5376><s%> which was of Bethsaida <S%G966><s%> of Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> and desired <S%G2065><s%> him, saying, <S%G3004><s%> Sir, <S%G2962><s%> we would <S%G2309><s%> see <S%G1492><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>
Philip <S%G5376><s%> comes <S%G2064><s%> and tells <S%G3004><s%> Andrew: <S%G406><s%> and again <S%G3825><s%> Andrew <S%G406><s%> and Philip <S%G5376><s%> tell <S%G3004><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> them, saying, <S%G3004><s%> The hour <S%G5610><s%> is come, <S%G2064><s%> that the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> should be glorified. <S%G1392><s%>

Truly, <S%G281><s%> truly, <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, Except <S%G3362><s%> a corn <S%G2848><s%> of wheat <S%G4621><s%> fall <S%G4098><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the ground <S%G1093><s%> and die, <S%G599><s%> it stays <S%G3306><s%> alone: <S%G3441><s%> but if <S%G1437><s%> it die, <S%G599><s%> it brings <S%G5342><s%> forth much <S%G4183><s%> fruit. <S%G2590><s%>

He that loves <S%G5368><s%> his life <S%G5590><s%> shall lose <S%G622><s%> it; and he that hates <S%G3404><s%> his life <S%G5590><s%> in this <S%G5129><s%> world <S%G2889><s%> shall keep <S%G5442><s%> it to life <S%G2222><s%> eternal. <S%G166><s%>

If <S%G1437><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> man serve <S%G1247><s%> me, let him follow <S%G190><s%> me; and where <S%G3699><s%> I am, <S%G1510><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> shall also <S%G2532><s%> my servant <S%G1249><s%> be: if <S%G1437><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> man serve <S%G1247><s%> me, him will my Father <S%G3962><s%> honor. <S%G5091><s%>

Now <S%G3568><s%> is my soul <S%G5590><s%> troubled; <S%G5015><s%> and what <S%G5101><s%> shall I say? <S%G2036><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> save <S%G4982><s%> me from this <S%G5026><s%> hour: <S%G5610><s%> but for this <S%G5124><s%> cause <S%G1223><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> I to this <S%G5026><s%> hour. <S%G5610><s%>

Father, <S%G3962><s%> glorify <S%G1392><s%> your name. <S%G3686><s%> Then <S%G3767><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> there a voice <S%G5456><s%> from heaven, <S%G3772><s%> saying, I have both <S%G2532><s%> glorified <S%G1392><s%> it, and will glorify <S%G1392><s%> it again. <S%G3825><s%>

The people <S%G3793><s%> therefore, <S%G3767><s%> that stood <S%G2476><s%> by, and heard <S%G191><s%> it, said <S%G3004><s%> that it thundered: <S%G1027><s%> <S%G1096><s%> others <S%G243><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> An angel <S%G32><s%> spoke <S%G2980><s%> to him.
Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said, <S%G2036><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%> came <S%G1096><s%> not because <S%G1223><s%> of me, but for your <S%G5209><s%> sakes.

Now <S%G3568><s%> is the judgment <S%G2920><s%> of this <S%G5127><s%> world: <S%G2889><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> shall the prince <S%G758><s%> of this <S%G5127><s%> world <S%G2889><s%> be cast <S%G1544><s%> out.
And I, if <S%G1437><s%> I be lifted <S%G5312><s%> up from the earth, <S%G1093><s%> will draw <S%G1670><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> men to me.
This <S%G5124><s%> he said, <S%G3004><s%> signifying <S%G4591><s%> what <S%G4169><s%> death <S%G2288><s%> he should <S%G3195><s%> die. <S%G599><s%>

The people <S%G3793><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> him, We have heard <S%G191><s%> out of the law <S%G3551><s%> that Christ <S%G5547><s%> stays <S%G3306><s%> for ever: <S%G165><s%> and how <S%G4459><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> you, The Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> be lifted <S%G5312><s%> up? who <S%G5101><s%> is this <S%G3778><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> of man? <S%G444><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to them, Yet <S%G2089><s%> a little <S%G3398><s%> while <S%G5550><s%> is the light <S%G5457><s%> with you. Walk <S%G4043><s%> while <S%G2193><s%> you have <S%G2192><s%> the light, <S%G5457><s%> lest <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3361><s%> darkness <S%G4653><s%> come <S%G2638><s%> on you: for he that walks <S%G4043><s%> in darkness <S%G4653><s%> knows <S%G1492><s%> not where <S%G4226><s%> he goes. <S%G5217><s%>

While <S%G2193><s%> you have <S%G2192><s%> light, <S%G5457><s%> believe <S%G4100><s%> in the light, <S%G5457><s%> that you may be the children <S%G5207><s%> of light. <S%G5457><s%> These <S%G5023><s%> things spoke <S%G2980><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> and departed, <S%G565><s%> and did hide <S%G2928><s%> himself from them.
But though he had done <S%G4160><s%> so <S%G5118><s%> many <S%G5118><s%> miracles <S%G4592><s%> before <S%G1715><s%> them, yet they believed <S%G4100><s%> not on <S%G1519><s%> him:

That the saying <S%G3056><s%> of Esaias <S%G2268><s%> the prophet <S%G4396><s%> might be fulfilled, <S%G4137><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> he spoke, <S%G2036><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> has believed <S%G4100><s%> our report? <S%G189><s%> and to whom <S%G5101><s%> has the arm <S%G1023><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> been revealed? <S%G601><s%>
Therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> they could <S%G1410><s%> not believe, <S%G4100><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> that Esaias <S%G2268><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> again, <S%G3825><s%>

He has blinded <S%G5186><s%> their eyes, <S%G3788><s%> and hardened <S%G4456><s%> their heart; <S%G2588><s%> that they should not see <S%G1492><s%> with their eyes, <S%G3788><s%> nor <S%G2532><s%> understand <S%G3539><s%> with their heart, <S%G2588><s%> and be converted, <S%G1994><s%> and I should heal <S%G2390><s%> them.
These <S%G5023><s%> things said <S%G2036><s%> Esaias, <S%G2268><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> he saw <S%G1492><s%> his glory, <S%G1391><s%> and spoke <S%G2980><s%> of him.

Nevertheless <S%G3676><s%> <S%G3305><s%> among <S%G1537><s%> the chief <S%G758><s%> rulers <S%G758><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> believed <S%G4100><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> him; but because <S%G1223><s%> of the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> they did not confess <S%G3670><s%> him, lest <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3361><s%> they should be put <S%G1096><s%> out of the synagogue: <S%G656><s%>
For they loved <S%G25><s%> the praise <S%G1391><s%> of men <S%G444><s%> more <S%G3123><s%> than <S%G2260><s%> the praise <S%G1391><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> cried <S%G2905><s%> and said, <S%G2036><s%> He that believes <S%G4100><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> me, believes <S%G4100><s%> not on <S%G1519><s%> me, but on <S%G1519><s%> him that sent <S%G3992><s%> me.
And he that sees <S%G2334><s%> me sees <S%G2334><s%> him that sent <S%G3992><s%> me.

I am come <S%G2064><s%> a light <S%G5457><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the world, <S%G2889><s%> that whoever <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3588><s%> believes <S%G4100><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> me should not abide <S%G3306><s%> in darkness. <S%G4653><s%>

And if <S%G1437><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> man hear <S%G191><s%> my words, <S%G4487><s%> and believe <S%G4100><s%> not, I judge <S%G2919><s%> him not: for I came <S%G2064><s%> not to judge <S%G2919><s%> the world, <S%G2889><s%> but to save <S%G4982><s%> the world. <S%G2889><s%>

He that rejects <S%G114><s%> me, and receives <S%G2983><s%> not my words, <S%G4487><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> one that judges <S%G2919><s%> him: the word <S%G3056><s%> that I have <S%G2192><s%> spoken, <S%G2980><s%> the same <S%G1565><s%> shall judge <S%G2919><s%> him in the last <S%G2078><s%> day. <S%G2250><s%>

For I have <S%G2192><s%> not spoken <S%G2980><s%> of myself; <S%G1683><s%> but the Father <S%G3962><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> sent <S%G3992><s%> me, he gave <S%G1325><s%> me a commandment, <S%G1785><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> I should say, <S%G2036><s%> and what <S%G5101><s%> I should speak. <S%G2980><s%>

And I know <S%G1492><s%> that his commandment <S%G1785><s%> is life <S%G2222><s%> everlasting: <S%G166><s%> whatever <S%G3739><s%> I speak <S%G2980><s%> therefore, <S%G3767><s%> even <S%G2531><s%> as the Father <S%G3962><s%> said <S%G2046><s%> to me, so <S%G3779><s%> I speak. <S%G2980><s%>
